• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated maps and real-time multiplayer features.
  • Players can mine resources, upgrade equipment, trade with others, and explore an expansive underground world.
  • The game includes a shop system for purchasing upgrades, consumables, and building materials.
  • Mobile controls are supported with a virtual D-pad and action buttons for touch devices.
  • Cloud save functionality allows players to sync their progress across devices using Puter integration.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining adventure game featuring procedurally generated worlds, real-time multiplayer interactions, and extensive upgrade systems. Players can mine resources, trade with others, and explore deep underground environments while managing fuel, hull integrity, and cargo capacity. The game supports both desktop and mobile controls, includes a comprehensive shop system, and offers cloud save functionality for cross-device progress synchronization.
